summary.span: 代表階層式網站導覽結構中的節點 (例如 類別以及實作抽象 類別所述的節點)。

span.span: Represents a node in the hierarchical site map structure such as that described by the class and classes that implement the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件都代表在網站導覽結構中的 [網站] 頁面。A object represents a Web site page in a site map structure. 物件會由靜態載入在執行階段使用一或多個網站導覽提供者從永續性儲存體中載入記憶體的網站導覽資料的類別。 objects are loaded by the static class at run time using one or more site map providers to load site map data from persistent storage into memory. 物件會包裝類別使用的 Web 伺服器控制項，例如控制項。 objects are wrapped by the class for use by Web server controls, such as the control. 類別包含數個屬性，用來描述單一頁面中的網站，包括屬性，描述頁面上，例如， ，和屬性。The class includes several properties that are used to describe a single page in a Web site, including properties that describe a page, such as the , , and properties. 而屬性由類別，這是 ASP.NET 預設網站導覽提供者，為提供者用以追蹤節點的內部集合中的查閱索引鍵，類別支援基本網站導覽提供者可以用來追蹤節點的屬性。Whereas the property is used by the class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, as a lookup key in the internal collections that the provider uses to track nodes, the class supports a basic property that can be used by site map providers to track nodes. 此外，屬性可由巡覽控制項來呈現頁面的導覽結構內的超連結。Additionally, the property is used by navigation controls to render hyperlinks to pages within a navigation structure. 屬性是易記名稱，通常是 Web 表單的 HTML 標題相同由巡覽控制項用來呈現簡單的標籤。The property is a friendly name for the , is often the same as the HTML title of a Web Form, and is used by navigation controls to render simple labels. 最後，的其他集合屬性可供使用站台網站導覽提供者物件，但需不適用於基底的其他屬性類別。Finally, a collection of additional attributes is available to site map providers that use objects, but require additional properties that are not available in the base class. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何建立新的站台對應的節點集合，以及加入元素到它。The first code example demonstrates how to create a new site map node collection and add elements to it. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何從文字檔載入網站地圖資料。The second code example demonstrates how to load site map data from a text file. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來建立新的建構函式集合，然後將項目新增至與其方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to create a new collection, and then add elements to it with the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SiteMapNode_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNode_2/CS/sitemapnode2acs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SiteMapNode_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SiteMapNode_2/VB/sitemapnode2avb.aspx.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何`SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`剖析文字檔案，其中包含以逗號分隔的字串中的站台對應資料。The following code example demonstrates how the `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` parses a text file that contains site map data in comma-delimited strings. 新物件加入至內部追蹤的集合會從檔案讀取每一行的類別。A new object is added to the internal tracking collections of the class for each line that is read from the file. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別，這是預設值ASP.NET 提供者實作會使用做為查閱索引鍵，若已提供一個節點 （如果 URL 未提供，節點產生的追蹤識別碼） 的屬性。The class, which is the default provider implementation for ASP.NET, uses the property as a lookup key, if one is provided for the node (if a URL is not provided, a tracking identifier is generated for the node). 因此，任何控制項提供 URL，並使用提供者的範圍內必須具有唯一的 URL。Therefore, any control that provides a URL and is used by the must have a unique URL within the scope of the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別，這是預設值ASP.NET 提供者實作會使用做為查閱索引鍵，若已提供一個節點 （如果 URL 未提供，節點產生的追蹤識別碼） 的屬性。The class, which is the default provider implementation for ASP.NET, uses the property as a lookup key, if one is provided for the node (if a URL is not provided, a tracking identifier is generated for the node). 因此，任何物件，提供 URL，並可由提供者的範圍內必須具有唯一的 URL。Therefore, any object that provides a URL and is used by the must have a unique URL within the scope of the provider. 集合的屬性 (attribute)會建立與可透過屬性，並可讓您輕鬆地套用額外的屬性至站台對應節點，並擴充其功能，而不需衍生自訂類別這麼做。The collection of attributes that the is created with is available through the property, and makes it easy to apply additional attributes to a site map node and extend its capabilities without deriving a custom class to do so. 提供角色提供一組可以檢視節點的角色集合時屬性會傳回`true`。Supply an collection of roles to provide a set of roles that can view the node when the property returns `true`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 提供者會使用做為查閱索引鍵的屬性。The provider uses the property as a lookup key. 因此，任何所用的提供者的範圍內必須具有唯一的 URL。Therefore, any that is used by the must have a unique URL within the scope of the provider. 如果沒有`title`或是`description`提供，呼叫或屬性傳回欄位。If no `title` or `description` is provided, calls to the or properties return an field. 若要以程式設計方式指定當地語系化的資源，其中一個設定的值`implicitResourceKey`唯一的名稱會用來識別當地語系化的資源的節點或一組`explicitResourceKeys`要的集合`name/value`配對，其中`name`是要當地語系化的自訂屬性的節點屬性和`value`包含自訂屬性的節點屬性的當地語系化值。To programmatically specify resources for localization, either set the value of `implicitResourceKey` to a unique name that will be used to identify localized resources for the node or set `explicitResourceKeys` to a collection of `name/value` pairs where `name` is the node property or custom attribute to localize and `value` contains localization values for the node property or custom attribute. 當地語系化的值可以設定適當的.resx 檔案中。The localized values can then be set in the appropriate .resx files. 如需如何當地語系化， ，和任何自訂屬性物件，請參閱[How to:當地語系化的網站導覽資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be63b4a0-fb82-44b4-bdbb-df1d2548cedc)。For more information about how to localize the , , and any custom properties of a object, see [How to: Localize Site-Map Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be63b4a0-fb82-44b4-bdbb-df1d2548cedc). 語法需求`explicitResourceKeys`集合，請參閱。For the syntax requirements of the `explicitResourceKeys` collection, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別，也就是 ASP.NET 的預設站台對應提供者實作，會使用做為查閱索引鍵的屬性。The class, which is the default site map provider implementation for ASP.NET, uses the property as a lookup key. 因此，任何物件，可由類別必須具有唯一的 URL，提供者的範圍內。Therefore, any object that is used by the class must have a unique URL within the scope of the provider. 忽略開頭和尾端空白字元。Leading and trailing white-space characters are ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性物件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of a object. `AccessSiteMapProvider`為不含任何資料列中儲存其根節點`parentnodeid`定義。The `AccessSiteMapProvider` stores its root node as a row that has no `parentnodeid` defined. 使用傳回的資料列物件，和屬性會設定資料讀取器中的值。The row is returned using an object, and properties are set from the values in the data reader. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#4)]
